Name: treatment of waste polyvinylchloride, unsanitary landfill, wet infiltration class (500mm) | waste polyvinylchloride | EN15804GD, U
Category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/382:Waste treatment and disposal/3821:Treatment and disposal of non-hazardous waste
Description: This is an inventory for an unsanitary, sub-controlled landfill for municipal solid waste. Ultimate average landfill height is 15 meters. Operation phase duration is 25 years. The total raw landfill gas mass produced in the landfill from this waste is 0.005145 kg. The total CH4 mass in the raw landfill gas is 0.004273 kg. Percentage of landfill gas directly emitted is 100w%. Leachate of the landfill is not treated, but emitted untreated. Based on average waste composition and climate data the end of carbonate phase is estimated to be reached 3382 years after waste deposition.
